entities.name: kingsley
entities.description: Kingsley was striding backward and forward, glancing up at the sky every time he turned.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry was reminded of Uncle Vernon pacing the living room a million years ago.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid, Hermione, and Lupin stood shoulder to shoulder, gazing upward in silence.

entities.name: the missing order members
entities.description: The slightest breath of wind made them all jump and turn toward the whispering bush or tree in the hope that one of the missing Order members might leap unscathed from its leaves
